body.text:
General Information:
An employee can take 11 Holidays in a year. 
An employee can take 25 leaves(including Sick leaves) in a year
An employee can take Special Sick Leave
An employee can take 5 days leave for marriage
Employees are eligible for Education Leave
For More details (CS Connect -> General -> Company Policies)
